comments:

no external jars.

Could you provide a test case to figure out what happen exactly here?
Thx
It has happened to me several times, but now unable to reproduce it :-(

Sounds similar to bug 73784 but for source file instead of class file.
If you want to avoid this issue, I suggest to use a 1.4 VM instead of 1.5 to
launch eclipse (even if eclipse support Java 1.5, it's currently recommended to
launch it with an 1.4 VM).
If you need (or want) to continue to use eclipse with 1.5 VM, please reopen if
you get this issue again and provide corresponding test case, thx

Resolved as WORKSFORME due to the fact that you cannot reproduce it.
Feel free to reopen it if you experience this problem again in the futur.
Thanks
